title: Sound On: Afghan Chaos, Booster Shots (Radio)
itunes:title: Sound On: Afghan Chaos, Booster Shots (Radio)
description:
Bloomberg Washington Correspondent Joe Mathieu delivers insight and analysis on the latest headlines from the White House and Capitol Hill, including conversations with influential lawmakers and key figures in politics and policy.


Guests: California Congressman John Garamendi, Anthony Cordesman, Middle East policy expert at the Center for Strategic and International Studies, Bloomberg Politics Contributor Rick Davis and Max Burns, Democratic Strategist and Founder of Third Degree Strategies.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
